# Function tanh

Calculate the hyperbolic tangent of a value

     tanh(x)

 For matrices, the function is evaluated element wise.




### Parameters

Parameter | Type | Description
--------- | ---- | -----------
`x` | Number &#124; Boolean &#124; Complex &#124; Unit &#124; Array &#124; Matrix | 

### Returns

Type | Description
---- | -----------
 | undefined
